segments.speaker: SPEAKER_A
segments.text: Good morning Sarah. Thanks for meeting with me today.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_B
segments.text: Good morning Michael. Happy to discuss the budget.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_A
segments.text: Let's start with the marketing allocation. We're proposing fifty thousand dollars.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_B
segments.text: That seems reasonable. I'd suggest allocating fifteen thousand for social media specifically.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_A
segments.text: Agreed. Now regarding product development, the team wants two senior developers.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_B
segments.text: What if we start with one senior and one mid-level? That would save forty thousand annually.

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_A
segments.text: Good compromise. I'll discuss with the CTO. Can you prepare the final summary by Friday?

segments.speaker: SPEAKER_B
segments.text: Absolutely. I'll have everything ready by Thursday afternoon.
